content:
# It seems that my inventory does not include any stone, which is why I encountered the error when trying to craft the stone furnace.
# 
# I need to gather some stone from the environment before I can proceed with crafting the furnace. 
# Let's locate a stone resource patch and harvest some stone.

# First, I will find the nearest stone resource patch.
stone_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)
print(f'Nearest Stone Position: {stone_position}')  # Displaying the position of the nearest stone resource.
